com.mlt.db

Class RandomData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.db.RandomData

  • public class RandomData
extends java.lang.Object
    A generator of random data, mainly records and recordsets, useful for tests.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      • getCode

        public java.lang.String getCode(RandomData.CodePattern pattern)
        Return a random code.
        Parameters:
        pattern - The code pattern.
        Returns:
        The random code.

      • getCode

        public java.lang.String getCode(java.lang.String pattern)
        Returns a random code based on the given pattern. Any character in the mask not included in the valid mask characters is treated literally. Valid mask characters are:
        • # a digit
        • A an upper case alpha numerical digit or letter
        • a a lower case alpha numerical digit or letter
        • ? an alpha numerical digit or letter with random case
        • L an upper case letter
        • l a lower case letter
        • ! a letter with random case
        Parameters:
        pattern - The pattern.
        Returns:
        The random code.

      • getCode

        public java.lang.String getCode(java.lang.String pattern,
                                java.lang.String letters,
                                java.lang.String digits)
        Returns a random code based on the given pattern. Any character in the mask not included in the valid mask characters is treated literally. Valid mask characters are:
        • # a digit
        • A an upper case alpha numerical digit or letter
        • a a lower case alpha numerical digit or letter
        • ? an alpha numerical digit or letter with random case
        • L an upper case letter
        • l a lower case letter
        • ! a letter with random case
        Parameters:
        pattern - The pattern.
        letters - Optional letters.
        digits - Optional list of digits.
        Returns:
        The random code.
